original_text: So that is why we work to serve God well. We continue to work, even when we have trouble. We do this because we believe that God will help us. He is the one who lives for ever and who saves all people. Certainly, he saves those who are believers.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 우리가 수고하고 힘쓰는 것은 우리 소망을 살아 계신 하나님께 둠이니 곧 모든 사람 특히 믿는 자들의 구주시라

sentences.original_text: So that is why we work to serve God well.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리가 하나님을 잘 섬기기 위해 일하는 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: We do this because we believe
He is the one who lives for ever
Certainly, he saves those who are believers.
